content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a trip to Austin, TX.
Oh nice! I'm actually from there! What did you do there?
I went to the rodeo, saw the bats fly out at night, and had a lot of great food.
That sounds awesome! I miss the food there. I live in Colorado now.
Oh, that's so cool! I've always wanted to go to Colorado.
It's beautiful here. I love the mountains.
I bet! I love hiking and camping.
Me too! We should go hiking sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Awesome! I'll DM you my number
